explanation: Meg claims she was home all Tuesday night and only handled a maintenance call by phone at 9 PM. But Clue 3 reveals her service door keycard was used at 8:35 PM to enter and 8:55 PM to exit â€” placing her in the building during the exact window the computer was accessed. Clue 1 shows the playlist was changed between 8:42 PM and 8:51 PM. Clue 2 confirms no one entered through the main lobby, so only a staff member with a service door keycard could have done it. Meg snuck in and rickrolled the building.
funFact: Rick Astley's 'Never Gonna Give You Up' has been rickrolling the internet since 2007 and has over 1.5 billion YouTube views.
